title: Govt to clear FAME 3 scheme in 1-2 months: Heavy Industries Minister Kumaraswamy
description: The government is set to finalize the third phase of its electric mobility adoption scheme, FAME, within the next two months. An inter-ministerial group is addressing issues from the first two phases. FAME 3 will replace the temporary Electric Mobility Promotion Scheme expiring in September.
